title: Darius can max stack hemmorage on execute with one attack, Mordekaiser can summon a Dragon ghost.
body: IT'S THE END TIMES!  THE END TIMES I TELL YOU!

replies.body: I like the Darius and Mord changes. The Garen one is okay, but the Skarner change is just bizzare.
I like garens changes it makes him the shut down king in team fights, oh you killed my teammate well this true damage is going to hurt.

But they nerfed everything else about his kit. Q silence reduced, W lost defense steroid and tensity for a ball of defense stat with a massive nerf to his E. For a buff to is R which will just encourage people to run to the carry and get deleted because with 1% true damage to low HP target is really strange when you damage and defense get gutted. His laning will be suffer so he "might" do more damage to someone after they kill some is total garage.
The W change is really interesting, because it's technically a *revert* of sorts to an age-old change...

His E was hella buffed dude.

The AD Ratio, and amount of damage procs was increased/

Actually, it's a huge nerf.

Right now at max rank, Judgement deals 60 damage per tick and ticks 6 times over the duration. This is a total base of 360 damage.

The current change reduces the damage to 28 at max rank, and at level 16 ticks 10 times, for a total of 280 base damage. 

They removed the crit stat from the ability, meaning that even though the AD will deal more from the greater number of ticks (5.5 total AD up from 3.3 total AD), previously strong items like IE and Yomuu's are now pretty much useless. 

In addition, the 20% slow while moving towards targets currently being damaged is nonsensical and makes the ability feel bad to use, and good look synergizing with Ravenous Hydra's active now.
didnt see those changes but now my god idk how I feel about all these nerfs.
The enemy team broke the Demacian law and took your team mates innocent life, the punishment is {{champion:86}} JUSTICE.{{champion:86}}

Honestly Garen isn't even like the Police or anything. 

Why not do that with Vi? She has a lot of single-target damage, and she actually uses autos.

Oh yeah and she's actually the police...

honestly, i cant stand the garen changes.  it makes him overly complex, gives him a noob trap (getting players to just chase the "villain"), and overall just makes me dislike him.  im not saying it's bad as far as power goes, but that certainly doesnt make it a good change.
And {{champion:72}}  gives enemy a passive.
NOW EVERYBODY GETS AN EXTRA PASSIVE! :D

When everyone has another passive......


NO ONE HAS.
These are great changes and i approve. I just want to know how long Morde has the dragon pokemon
you think it's Kyurem-W?
nah Altaria man :)

it's not quite fluffy enough, especially for Mega Altaria. 
could be Dragonite, or actually Garchomp. Garchomp fits pretty well.
